title: Top 100 ranked colleges in India
comments: 86 off the 100 in 5 states, and 0 in 15 plus states. No wonder the imbalance is striking.
Our higher education is oversaturated. We need more resources

You can't have more resources. We are a broke ass country. The current regime has killed nearly all public educational institutions, barring a few like the IIMs and IITs. If you bring investments from outside then you will have to privatise education which ends up making it available only to those who can afford it. Faculty are getting paid less than 10k a month. This shit will hurt us bad!
The future isn't looking good when we prioritize statues & religious buildings over educational institutes & hospitals.
